main event: Unidentified aircraft were observed by the personnel of a radar station near Point Hope, Alaska, on April 13, 1952.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at a radar station,The objects were flying in a southeast direction at an unknown altitude and speed,There were no known aircraft in the area at the time of the sighting,The incident was potentially considered a first Soviet overflight of Alaskan territory,The document is part of the Project Blue Book record and is unclassified.
